title: Frequently Asked Questions
submitTitle: Didn’t find what you were looking for?
toastSuccessDesc: Thank you! We will review and add an answer soon.

questions.question: How do I add a new farm to my account?
questions.answer: Go to the dashboard, click on "Add Farm", and fill out the required farm details including location, pond count, and device linkage.

questions.question: What types of devices can I link to a pond?
questions.answer: Currently, you can link Sensors, Cameras, and Feeders. Each pond can have one or more of these device types.

questions.question: How frequently is sensor data updated?
questions.answer: Sensor data is updated every 10 minutes and can be viewed live in the monitoring dashboard.

questions.question: Can I control feeding schedules from the app?
questions.answer: Yes, go to the "Feeding Control" section, select your pond, and set or automate feeding times.

questions.question: I’m not receiving any data from a device. What should I do?
questions.answer: Check device connectivity, ensure it’s powered on, and restart it. If the issue persists, raise a support ticket via the Support page.

questions.question: How can I change my registered phone number?
questions.answer: Visit the Profile page and click on "Edit Profile" to update your contact information.
